document_data.name: Ali ben Ali
document_data.home: [[City of Brass]], the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Ali ben Ali''' was an inhabitant of the [[City of Brass]] on the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: Ali was just as famous for his somber demeanor as he was for his magical prowess.
document_data.Description: Ali was a pauper. As such he was quite disheveled and filthy.
document_data.History: Renowned in [[Zakhara]] for his precise visions of the future, Ali traveled to the City of Brass 20 years ago with the hopes of becoming the [[Marrake al-Sidan al-Hariq ben Lazan|Great Sultan's]] personal councilor. It wasn't until then that Ali discovered his abilities as an accomplished [[Mystic (Zakhara)|mystic]] did not work for [[genie]]s. Amused by Ali's antics, the Sultan had him blinded and cast out of his court.
document_data.Activities: Ali wandered the streets and markets of the City of Brass, struggling to earn a living by telling traveler's fortunes.
